trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows menu or toolbar command item.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item de comando de menu ou barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The MenuCommand class represents information about a Windows menu or toolbar command.
trans-unit.target: A classe MenuCommand representa informações sobre um comando de menu ou barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface allows you to add MenuCommand objects to the Visual Studio menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>interface permite que você adicione MenuCommand objetos para o menu do Visual Studio.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: This class provides the following members: - An event-handler property to which you can attach an event handler for the command.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece os seguintes membros:-uma propriedade de manipulador de eventos para o qual você pode anexar um manipulador de eventos para o comando.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> property that uniquely identifies the command.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>propriedade que identifica exclusivamente o comando.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> method that executes the command.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>método que executa o comando.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> method that can be overridden to handle the event that occurs when a new command is selected.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A>método que pode ser substituído para manipular o evento que ocorre quando um novo comando é selecionado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Boolean flag states that indicate whether the command is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Estados de sinalizador booliano que indicam se o comando é <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>, ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A> property that indicates the OLE command status code for the command.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A>código de status para o comando de comando de propriedade que indica a OLE.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An override for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Uma substituição para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The event to raise when the user selects the menu item or toolbar button.
trans-unit.target: O evento ser gerado quando o usuário seleciona o botão de barra de ferramentas ou item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The unique command ID that links this menu command to the environment's menu.
trans-unit.target: A ID exclusiva do comando que vincula a esse comando de menu ao menu do ambiente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is checked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este item de menu é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item está marcado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu command changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando de menu é alterado.

trans-unit.source: A command can change if it becomes checked or disabled.
trans-unit.target: Um comando pode alterar se ele se torna marcado ou desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> associated with this menu command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> associado com este comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> associated with the menu command.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> associada com o comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu item is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este item de menu está disponível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item estiver habilitado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command.
trans-unit.target: Chama o comando.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command with the given parameter.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o comando com o parâmetro especificado.

trans-unit.source: An optional argument for use by the command.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento opcional para uso pelo comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the OLE command status code for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código de status do comando OLE para este item de menu.

trans-unit.source: An integer containing a mixture of status flags that reflect the state of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que contém uma mistura de sinalizadores de status que refletem o estado do item de menu.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnCommandChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCommandChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the public properties associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as propriedades públicas associadas a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All menu commands store their public properties in the Properties collection.
trans-unit.target: Todos os comandos de menu armazenam suas propriedades públicas na coleção de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The key in the properties dictionary is the property name.
trans-unit.target: A chave no dicionário de propriedades é o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This allows for generic enumeration of properties and provides a consistent substrate from which new properties can be added without modifying the class definition.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite enumeração genérica de propriedades e fornece um substrato consistente do qual novas propriedades podem ser adicionadas sem modificar a definição de classe.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the public properties of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém as propriedades públicas do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is supported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este item de menu é suportado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is supported, which is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item for compatível, o que é o padrão. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this menu command.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação de cadeia de caracteres desse comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandID*> property appended with the names of any flags that are set, separated by pipe bars (|). These flag properties include <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked*>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled*>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported*>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor da <> </> *> propriedade anexada com os nomes de quaisquer sinalizadores definidos, separados por barras de pipe (|). Essas propriedades de sinalizador incluem <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este item de menu é visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item estiver visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
